### Feature Summary
Provide a short description of the feature.

### User Story
As a <type of user>, I want <goal>, so that <reason>.

Example:
As a runner, I want to log in securely, so that only I can access my training data.

### Acceptance Criteria
List measurable, testable conditions for completion.

- [ ] Criteria 1
- [ ] Criteria 2
- [ ] Criteria 3

Example:
- [ ] User can sign up with email
- [ ] User can log in and stay logged in
- [ ] User profile is automatically created

### Branch
Specify the branch for this work or confirm if it already exists.


### Deliverables / Checklist
Describe required tasks and files.

- [ ] Required components, pages, or modules
- [ ] Database, API calls, or workflow changes
- [ ] Tests or validation steps
- [ ] No secrets or credentials committed
- [ ] Runs without console errors

### Security Considerations
Check if applicable. If yes, describe precautions.

- [ ] Supabase Row Level Security (RLS)
- [ ] Authentication
- [ ] Tokens, keys, or secrets

### Testing Instructions
Explain how the feature should be tested and validated.

### Additional Notes (Optional)
Add any relevant documentation, screenshots, or references.
